snippet: A Tunisian court on Thursday fined a newspaper publisher for printing a photograph of a soccer player with his nude girlfriend, raising concerns about a media crackdown by the new Islamist government.
lead_paragraph: A Tunisian court on Thursday fined a newspaper publisher for printing a photograph of a soccer player with his nude girlfriend, raising concerns about a media crackdown by the new Islamist government.

headline.main: Tunisia: Publisher Fined for Nude Photo
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Publisher Fined for Nude Photo
